body.name: Legendary Whitetails Womens Cottage Escape Flannel Long Sleeve Plaid and Solid Color Clothes, Fitted Button Down
features: Origin Made in the USA or Imported
Full front button closure, button closure cuffs
body.description: Let loose in our timeless flannel, featuring a classic design with chambray lined collar and cuffs. Made of soft brushed mid-weight cotton flannel, this yarn-dyed shirt is just right and very comfortable. Wear it alone or layer up during those brisk fall days. Pairs perfectly with our Womens Quilted Vest.Size Instructions:Bust: Measure around the fullest part of your chest, keeping the tape parallel to the floor.Waist: Bend to the side to find your natural waist. Measure keeping the tape slightly loose.Hips: Measure around fullest part of hips while standing

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Legendary Whitetails | Men’s and Women’s Outdoors-Inspired Clothing For a quarter of a century, Legendary Whitetails has celebrated the spirit of American heritage, creating high quality flannels, shirt jackets, vests and coats that are both durable and stylish for every outdoorsman and woman. Our love for the great outdoors defines who we are, a passion coursing through our veins. We acknowledge that you can't always be out in the wilderness. Though now you can bring the spirit of your cherished sport with you wherever and whenever you are

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I like the color, shirt is great quality, but..
reviews.reviewText: The color is great, the quality is great, the shirt is semi soft, but the fit is odd. The bust fits well, but the waist is tight when buttoned up. Not sure if I should have went a size up. I bought a size large. I wanted a looser fit. I kept the shirt but wear it unbuttoned.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Overall good quality
reviews.reviewText: The quality of this shirt is very good. The fabric is yarn dyed versus printed on the fabric which should keep the colors vibrant longer. A lot of attention to details such as a flattering fit versus the usual boxy fit found in most flannel shirts. The shirt is long enough to cover your back side and for those that have more ample hips the shirts flared sides provides for a roomier fit. Having sewed many of my clothes over the years the only thing I didn't like was that the pattern did not match up on the sides, however it matched perfectly in the front. I haven't washed it yet but with it being 100% cotton I plan to wash on cold and hang dry. For reference I am 5'3", 120 lbs, the shirt in the picture is size small. I purchased a medium before this one and it was too big, I'm returning it but only to exchange sizes because I like the shirt so much.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great shirt, but be aware of shrinkage!
reviews.reviewText: I love almost everything about these shirts. The fabric is soft, yet sturdy. The quality is above what I expected at this price point. The tailored fit is perfect. The only drawback is how much they shrink. A lot. Like, at least a full size.I am a firm Medium, at 5'6" and 149 lbs. I wanted this to be a second layer, so I ordered Large in a couple of colors. They fit perfectly over a base layer. Then I washed them. They still fit, but definitely not over anything more than a thin tank, and the sleeves are now too short. Admittedly, my arms are a little long. So I ordered this one in XL, washed it, and now it's a nice Large to go over a light or medium-weight base layer. I do highly recommend these! Just order up a size if you plan to wash it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best flannel shirt I’ve found in years!
reviews.reviewText: Quality and weightof fabric excellent, I bought a size up so I could wear a lightweight sweater under it. They is good! The sleeves are long enough, too. It’s been washed one, pulled out of dryer when nearly dry and looks great! Compared to other flannel shirts I’ve ever had, this is seriously better!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This shirt is better quality than any clothing I’ve probably ever purchased off this site. The flannel is nice and heavy, the colors pretty, and the shirt seems to be very well made. It washes well, and I really like that it has a bit of shape to it and isn’t wide and boxy like so many these days. I ordered my usual size and it fits well overall, although it is slightly snug around my hips, but that’s my build, not the shirt’s fault. My only concern and the only thing that would make me think twice before ordering in another color is that the shirt gaps open a bit between the middle/upper buttons sometimes even though it doesn’t feel tight at all. Since I always layer with at least a tank top underneath, it’s not a deal breaker. I am pleased enough with the fabric and quality that I will likely purchase again, even if I decide to try sizing up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute shirt and fits great!
reviews.reviewText: This shirt is very well made, has pretty colors, and fits great. Great length, sleeves aren't tight or too long, and the style is quite flattering. I'm going to buy other colors as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect comfy flannel
reviews.reviewText: Runs a little small across chest so I sized up for the next oversized cozy feel I wanted. Great fabric

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful, well made, but slim cut
reviews.reviewText: Size XL: Gorgeous shirt, warm, 100% medium weight cotton flannel, and extremely well made (opinion of dressmaker). I'm a size 14 with a thick waist (no flat tummy here) and it was way too tight on my bust and tummy. 100% cotton will undoubtedly shrink even in cold water wash and line dried, and I like to dry my cotton shirts on low in dryer to prevent wrinkling, so that's another shrinkage issue.The shirt is darted down both sides of front and both sides of back, thus the slim-fit. If the darts hadn't been there, it would have been a perfect fit with room for shrinkage. I just ordered the XXL and hope the shoulders don't hang halfway down to my elbows, and hope it won't be too baggy. I never buy XXL, but I really loved this shirt and hope it works. I can always shorten it and roll up the sleeves if it drives me nuts. I'm 5'5" and wear size 14 bottoms and XL tops, and this shirt is very long. Back of shirt came down to mid-thigh and front just a tad shorter than the back.Update on XXL: The shoulders hang 2" off my shoulders and it looks really sloppy, and the sleeves are beyond my finger tips. The shirt is the length of a long night shirt, and there's no way I am willing to alter all of these things. I wanted this shirt to fit so much, but this one will have to go back also. The bust and tummy area do fit much better, but the overall shirt is just way too big.

reviews.reviewTitle: Mis favoritas para el invierno y las salidas al bosque
reviews.reviewText: De muy buena calidad. Colores firmes y muy resistentes. Me encantan!
O el control de calidad de esta marca es mala o venden saldos, llegó sin etiquetas, el bordado está chueco.

Yes, they are a bit expensive.... but the flannel is thicker, the colours beautiful, and the slightly tailored fit more feminine in a "lumberjack" shirt. I wore the royal blue/purple version for Christmas this year, because I thought it looked dressy and festive enough for a country Christmas that involved a walk in the woods before dinner. I'd love to get all the colours, but can't justify spending that much on more flannel shirts when I already have lots of cheap Walmart ones that look like pajamas.

Enfin j’ai trouvé une chemise confortable et avec assez d’amplitude pour mes bras. J’ai les bras un peu dodus et j’ai toujours de la difficulté avec les manches qui sont souvent inconfortables et trop ajustées mais avec cette chemise je suis à l’aise. J’ai pris ma taille habituelle. Le seul bémol c’est la longueur mais comme je ne mesure que 5pieds 4 c’est un peu normal mais cela ne m’empêche pas d’apprécier cette chemise. Très satisfaite de mon achat.

reviews.reviewTitle: Don’t put this in the dryer
reviews.reviewText: This is a beautifully made shirt, super soft flannel, thick enough for some warmth. The sleeves are comfortably roomy and a good length so you can really move. This is not a figure hugging cut, even with my big butt there’s lots of room. I ordered XL rather than my usual size M to allow for shrinking. Cold wash did not affect the fabric at all, neither did a short trip in the dryer on low. But if you accidentally leave it in the dryer a bit too long the shirt will shrink significantly.I ordered 2 more shirts in my normal size M. They will be washed cold and dried flat only, it’s not worth taking the risk with the dryer no matter what the washing instructions say.
